<Extension()> Public Function GetCreateOperationStatus (operations As IStorageManagementClient, operationStatusLink As String) As StorageAccountCreateResponse

Docs.param: Required. The URL where the status of the long-running create operation can be checked.
Docs.summary: The Get Create Operation Status operation returns the status of the specified create operation. After calling the asynchronous Begin Create operation, you can call Get Create Operation Status to determine whether the operation has succeeded, failed, or is still in progress.
Docs.returns: The Create storage account operation response.
